product_name: Sperry Top-Sider Ricochet Bungee Water Shoes - Men's
long_description: The slip-on Sperry Top-Sider Ricochet Bungee Water Shoes for men combine stable, sensitive midsoles with lugged outsoles to provide excellent traction for crossing rugged, rocky shorelines. SON-R Technology(TM), with its unique outsole/midsole design, provides natural sensory feedback allowing for greater stability and agility on uneven terrain. Redesigned outsoles feature dynamic lugs and Adaptive Wave-Siping(TM) for enhanced traction on rocks, docks and boat decks. Hydro Grip(TM) rubber outsoles deliver maximum traction and increased agility and stability; outsoles allow water to escape. Nylon and mesh uppers promote ultra-fast drying. Anatomical shape and flexible construction promotes natural foot movement. Sperry Top-Sider Ricochet Bungee Water Shoes for men have antimicrobial linings that minimize odor. Adjustable bungee allows for secure wear and easy on and off.
short_description: The slip-on Sperry Top-Sider Ricochet Bungee Water Shoes for men combine stable, sensitive midsoles with lugged outsoles to provide excellent traction for crossing rugged, rocky shorelines.
